scene_manager module¶

class scene_manager.Scene_Manager(images, font)¶

Bases: object

Facilitates scene transitions.

Parameters:
  • images – Dictionary of images that will eventually be used in the Game constructor.
  • font – Used to construct the title screen’s text.
update(display, events, keys)¶

Called every frame to update self and process user input.

Parameters:
  • display – The size of the window.
  • events – The events to be processed.
  • keys – The list of keys and whether they are pressed down or not.
